meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tremendous.
meanings.sent1: The tremendousness of the mountain took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: Her smile lit up the room with its tremendousness.
meanings.sent3: The tremendousness of the cake made everyone's eyes widen in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The tremendousness of the storm was like a fierce dragon roaring in the sky.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the tremendousness of the fireworks on New Year's Eve.

meanings.definition: The extent or degree of being tremendous.
meanings.sent1: The tremendousness of his achievement was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: We were all amazed by the tremendousness of the crowd at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The tremendousness of the traffic jam made us laugh at the absurdity of it all.
meanings.sent4: The tremendousness of her talent shone like a bright star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The tremendousness of the waterfall's roar echoed through the canyon.
